data.name: FungibleFlex
data.text: Developed and designed software architecture for the Fungible Flex product.• Consists of three Web applications that interact with each other and the Nest.Js backend.• Built with advanced ArangoDB Database for a faster and more secure database system.

data.name: Queue Up
data.text: Contactless queue management system developed to help businesses in Lebanon during the COVID crisis Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the front-end and using Django Python and MongoDB for the backend Made use of multiple API’s mainly the Twilio API to get instant SMS notifications

data.name: EasyList
